| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [EvilHack - monst.c, line 3570](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/0.7.1/src/monst.c#L3570) |

A **mind flayer larva**, ;, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). The mind flayer larva is a [tiny](/wiki/Tiny "Tiny"), [slithy](/wiki/Slithy "Slithy") and limbless [sea monster](/wiki/Sea_monster "Sea monster")-like larval [illithid](/wiki/Illithid "Illithid") - it is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivorous "Omnivorous"), [amphibious](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious"), capable of [swimming](/wiki/Swimming "Swimming"), has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), and can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").

A mind flayer larva has a tentacle attack that can attach itself to a target's face: if left attached this way, the larva will burrow into the victim's brain on the next turn and [kill them instantly](/wiki/Instadeath "Instadeath") as the larva becomes a [mind flayer](/wiki/Mind_flayer "Mind flayer"). Mind flayer larvae possess [psychic resistance](/index.php?title=Psychic_resistance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Psychic resistance (page does not exist)").

## Generation

Mind flayer larvae are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile.

Mind flayer larvae only generate in [mind flayer nurseries](/index.php?title=Mind_flayer_nurseries\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mind flayer nurseries (page does not exist)") at level creation.

Sixteen mind flayers are placed in the cells of the [Wizard quest](/wiki/Wizard_quest "Wizard quest") goal level at level creation.

Player characters killed by a mind flayer larva's tentacle attack will arise as a mind flayer instead of a [ghost](/wiki/Ghost "Ghost") if a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file is left.

## Strategy

While a mind flayer larva is relatively weak in terms of stats and cannot move outside the shallow water they generate in, their sole attack can easily end a character's run if it lands unless that larva can quickly be killed or removed.

## Encyclopedia entry

Mind flayer larva are only ever found in mind flayer nurseries, tended to by an adult mind flayer. Relatively weak, they exist in shallow pools of water and will not venture from them. They have one attack, which is to attempt to attach itself to its victims face. If successful, the victim has only moments to kill or remove the mind flayer larva from its face. If not removed in time, the mind flayer larva burrows itself into its victims brain, killing them instantly. The larva controls the host body, feeding off of it and eventually growing into a full-grown mind flayer.
html:
Mind flayer larva

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
; mind flayer larva (No tile)
Difficulty 8
Attacks Tentacles 1d2 drowning
; mind flayer larva (No tile)
Difficulty 8
Attacks

Tentacles 1d2 drowning

Base level 5
Base experience 1072
Speed 15
Base AC 8
Base MR 60
Alignment -8 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 20
Nutritional value 5
Size Tiny
Resistances psychic
Resistances conveyed none

A mind flayer larva:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • has a serpent body.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 3570

A mind flayer larva, ;, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. The mind flayer larva is a tiny, slithy and limbless sea monster-like larval illithid - it is omnivorous, amphibious, capable of swimming, has infravision, and can be seen via infravision.

A mind flayer larva has a tentacle attack that can attach itself to a target's face: if left attached this way, the larva will burrow into the victim's brain on the next turn and kill them instantly as the larva becomes a mind flayer. Mind flayer larvae possess psychic resistance.

Generation

Mind flayer larvae are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile.

Mind flayer larvae only generate in mind flayer nurseries at level creation.

Sixteen mind flayers are placed in the cells of the Wizard quest goal level at level creation.

Player characters killed by a mind flayer larva's tentacle attack will arise as a mind flayer instead of a ghost if a bones file is left.

Strategy

While a mind flayer larva is relatively weak in terms of stats and cannot move outside the shallow water they generate in, their sole attack can easily end a character's run if it lands unless that larva can quickly be killed or removed.

Encyclopedia entry

Mind flayer larva are only ever found in mind flayer nurseries, tended to by an adult mind flayer. Relatively weak, they exist in shallow pools of water and will not venture from them. They have one attack, which is to attempt to attach itself to its victims face. If successful, the victim has only moments to kill or remove the mind flayer larva from its face. If not removed in time, the mind flayer larva burrows itself into its victims brain, killing them instantly. The larva controls the host body, feeding off of it and eventually growing into a full-grown mind flayer.

A '''mind flayer larva''', {{brightmagenta|;}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. The mind flayer larva is a [[tiny]], [[slithy]] and limbless [[sea monster]]-like larval [[illithid]] - it is [[omnivorous]], [[amphibious]], capable of [[swimming]], has [[infravision]], and can be seen via [[infravision]].

A mind flayer larva has a tentacle attack that can attach itself to a target's face: if left attached this way, the larva will burrow into the victim's brain on the next turn and [[instadeath|kill them instantly]] as the larva becomes a [[mind flayer]]. Mind flayer larvae possess [[psychic resistance]].

==Generation==
Mind flayer larvae are not randomly generated, and are always created hostile.

Mind flayer larvae only generate in [[mind flayer nurseries]] at level creation.

Sixteen mind flayers are placed in the cells of the [[Wizard quest]] goal level at level creation.

Player characters killed by a mind flayer larva's tentacle attack will arise as a mind flayer instead of a [[ghost]] if a [[bones]] file is left.

==Strategy==
While a mind flayer larva is relatively weak in terms of stats and cannot move outside the shallow water they generate in, their sole attack can easily end a character's run if it lands unless that larva can quickly be killed or removed.

==Encyclopedia entry==
{{encyclopedia|
Mind flayer larva are only ever found in mind flayer nurseries, tended to by an adult mind flayer.  Relatively weak, they exist in shallow pools of water and will not venture from them.  They have one attack, which is to attempt to attach itself to its victims face.  If successful, the victim has only moments to kill or remove the mind flayer larva from its face.  If not removed in time, the mind flayer larva burrows itself into its victims brain, killing them instantly.  The larva controls the host body, feeding off of it and eventually growing into a full-grown mind flayer.
